jsonSerializer.NullValueHandling = NullValueHandling.Include.
jsonSerializer.ContractResolver = new DefaultContractResolver().

Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

Docs.param: A Boolean that indicates whether the method call comes from a Dispose method (its value is true) or from a finalizer (its value is false).
Docs.summary: Disposes objects used by the class.
Docs.remarks: The disposing parameter should be false when called from a finalizer, and true when called from the IDisposable.Dispose method. In other words, it is true when deterministically called and false when non-deterministically called.

Docs.param: A collection of Ids for each item to be retrieved.
Docs.summary: Reads one or more items with matching keys from the Cosmos DB container.
Docs.returns: A dictionary containing the retrieved items.
Docs.exception: Exception thrown if the array of keys (Ids for the items to be retrieved) is null.

abstract member WriteAsync : System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, obj> * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task override this.WriteAsync : System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, obj> * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

Docs.param: A dictionary of items to be inserted or updated. The dictionary item key is used as the ID for the inserted / updated item.
Docs.summary: Inserts or updates one or more items into the Cosmos DB container.
Docs.returns: A Task representing the work to be executed.
Docs.exception: Exception thrown if the changes dictionary is null.
Exception thrown is the etag is empty on any of the items within the changes dictionary.
